sentences.sentence: "Storytelling hurts retailers and entertains consumers," said Paula Courtney, President of the Verde group.
sentences.translation: “这些说法的流传伤害了零售商，但娱乐了消费者。” Verde 集团总裁保拉·考特尼说。

sentences.sentence: He also teaches (and entertains) budding Picassos.
sentences.translation: 他还教授萌芽中的毕加索(也以此为乐)。
